query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZBST203 SET BS203_TDT = #BS203_TDT#, BS203_GDT = #BS203_GDT#, BS203_COMA = #BS203_COMA#, BS203_AMTA = #BS203_AMTA#, BS203_AMTW = #BS203_AMTW#, BS203_AMTT = #BS203_AMTT#, BS203_RSN = #BS203_RSN#, BS203_COMB = #BS203_COMB#, BS203_AMTB = #BS203_AMTB#, BS203_PST = #BS203_PST#, BS203_RMK = #BS203_RMK#, BS203_UDT = HEX(CURRENT DATE), BS203_UID = #G_USER_ID# WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND BS203_AYM = #BS201_AYM# AND BS203_ASQ = #BS201_ASQ#
